com.bassintag.tekengine

Class TekEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.TekEngine

  • public final class TekEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    TekEngine.java created for TekEngine Main class of the engine, sets up the opengl window and then controls updating and rendering. This class is a singleton
    Since:
    01/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine
